T02D2901:260b-0: @260b ` // de'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bzhugs //
T02D2901:260b-1: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02D2901:260b-2: sa gzhi shin tu legs pa la //
T02D2901:260b-3: thab khung rgyar ni khru gang zhing //
T02D2901:260b-4: zabs su khru phyed brkos pa dag / kha khyer sor bzhi gnyis dor bya //
T02D2901:260b-5: ba yi rnam pa lnga yis byugs //
T02D2901:260b-6: kha dog dkar po byas nas kyang //
T02D2901:260b-7: dri dkar 'o ma me tog dor //
T02D2901:260b-8: dkyil 'du rdo rje sor brgyad pa //
T02D2901:260b-9: nang du rdo rjes bskor nas kyang //
T02D2901:260b-10: tha ma me yi 'od zer can //
T02D2901:260b-11: bya ba thab khung rim pa'o //
T02D2901:260b-12: tsandan p'a la sha dag dang //
T02D2901:260b-13: byang chub shing dang n+ya gro dha //
T02D2901:260b-14: dri bzangs dri zhim pa yi shing //
T02D2901:260b-15: srog chags med cing ma rul ba //
T02D2901:260b-16: gsar ba khru gang tshad la ni //
T02D2901:260b-17: 'o ma sbrang rtsi bran nas kyang //
T02D2901:260b-18: dri zhim pa yi chu yis gtor //
T02D2901:260b-19: thab kyi kho ra khor yug tu //
T02D2901:260b-20: ku sha rtse mo phyir bstan pa //
T02D2901:260b-21: bkram la bud shing brtsig par bya //
T02D2901:260b-22: thab bas mtho na nyes par 'gyur //
T02D2901:260b-23: de ni bud shing rim pa'o //
T02D2901:260b-24: rtse mo'i cha las byung ba yi //
T02D2901:260b-25: yam shing sor ni bcu gnyis pa //
T02D2901:260b-26: gsar zhing 'dab ma bcas pa dang //
T02D2901:260b-27: drang zhing bla skams med pa ste //
T02D2901:260b-28: skyon dang bral ba'i yam shing la //
T02D2901:261a-2: dri yi tshogs kyis bsangs nas kyang //
T02D2901:261a-3: mchod pa'i don du g-yas su gzhag / de ni yam shing rim pa'o //
T02D2901:261a-4: dkar gsum mngar gsum 'bras chan dang //
T02D2901:261a-5: 'bras thug lag pan la du dang //
T02D2901:261a-6: sman sna tshogs dang bza' ba'i rdzas //
T02D2901:261a-7: til la sogs pa ji snyed kun //
T02D2901:261a-8: bsreg pa'i don du g-yas su gzhag / mar khu rdo rje dril bu dang //
T02D2901:261a-9: dgang gzar blugs gzar mdun du'o //
T02D2901:261a-10: me tog smos dang mar me dri //
T02D2901:261a-11: bshos gtsang rol mo ji snyed pa //
T02D2901:261a-12: mchod pa'i don du g-yon du gzhag / mchod yon las kyi bum pa ni //
T02D2901:261a-13: mnyes dang bsang phyir g-yas su gzhag / mchod rdzas bsreg rdzas rim pa'o //
T02D2901:261a-14: de nas skad cig ltar bskyed la //
T02D2901:261a-15: dus nas brtsams te mngon rtogs kyi //
T02D2901:261a-16: cho ga'i rim pa ji snyed pa //
T02D2901:261a-17: sgrub thabs bzhin du bsgom par bya //
T02D2901:261a-18: de ni rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyi //
T02D2901:261a-19: mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D2901:261a-20: de nas thab ni bsang byas la //
T02D2901:261a-21: aa las padma'i gzhal yas khang //
T02D2901:261a-22: dkar zhing zlum pa mdzes pa bskyed //
T02D2901:261a-23: bam las chu yi dkyil 'khor te //
T02D2901:261a-25: aa dang ma las nyi ma'i gdan //
T02D2901:261a-26: h'um las rdo rje dkar po ste //
T02D2901:261a-27: der bskyed pa ni rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2901:261a-28: zhu bar ram las gru gsum me //
T02D2901:261a-29: de nas me lha'i rgyal po ni //
T02D2901:261a-30: dkar zhing zhi la sgeg pa ste //
T02D2901:261a-31: zhal gcig phyag bzhi skyel krung phyed //
T02D2901:261a-32: chu yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing //
T02D2901:261a-33: tshangs pa'i skud pa se ral gzar //
T02D2901:261a-34: g-yas na dbyug pa spyi blugs te //
T02D2901:261a-35: g-yon na phreng ba ku mu ta //
T02D2901:261a-36: dbu rgyan la sogs rgyan rab mdzes //
T02D2901:261a-37: bskyed la ye shes me lha dgug / gong ltar mchod pas mnyes byas la //
T02D2901:261a-38: dza: h'um bam ho: sa dgug gzhug bya //
T02D2901:261a-39: dbang bskur ba dang byin brlab pa //
T02D2901:261a-40: mchod pas rab tu mnyes byas nas //
T02D2901:261a-41: bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di dag kyang //
T02D2901:261a-42: rdo rje dril bu ldan pas kyang //
T02D2901:261a-43: klu dang ldan pas bstod pa bya//
T02D2901:261a-44: h'um me lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa mchog gi sras //
T02D2901:261a-45: me lha'i rgyal po dag gis dbang bskur ba //
T02D2901:261a-46: shes rab mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad sreg /'dzin byed me lha nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2901:261a-47: de nas dgang gzar blugs gzar ni //
T02D2901:261a-48: lag pa g-yas g-yon thogs nas kyang//
T02D2901:261b-0: @261b me lha bdud rtsi'i zhal nyid du //
T02D2901:261b-1: sngags 'di dag gis bsreg par bya //
T02D2901:261b-2: aom badzra aa gan ye ma h'a bha tva dzv'a
T02D2901:261b-3: la ya sarba bha smim ku ru sarba du sht'a
T02D2901:261b-4: na h'um phat / na ma :che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di /
T02D2901:261b-5: sh'anti d+ku ru ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2901:261b-6: brgya rtsa brgyad dam lda bcu ste //
T02D2901:261b-7: nyi shu lnga'am bdun du dbul //
T02D2901:261b-8: de ni me lha'i rim pa'o//
T02D2901:261b-9: de nas me lha'i thugs ka'i nang //
T02D2901:261b-10: padma nyi zla'i gdan stengs su //
T02D2901:261b-11: h'um las rdo rje sngon po ste //
T02D2901:261b-12: de las rdo rje 'dzin pa ni //
T02D2901:261b-13: mngon par rtogs pa'i cho ga bzhin //
T02D2901:261b-14: gsal ba nyid du bskyed par bya //
T02D2901:261b-15: de nas mchod pas mnyes byas nas //
T02D2901:261b-16: bstod pa dag kyang rab tu brjod //
T02D2901:261b-17: de nas bsreg rdzas dbul ba ni //
T02D2901:261b-18: rtsa ba'i sngags ni 'ba' zhig la //
T02D2901:261b-19: sreg sngags 'di dag btags la dbul //
T02D2901:261b-20: aaom sarba p'u dza me gha ratna aa garbha na
T02D2901:261b-21: ma: che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di sh'anti d+ku
T02D2901:261b-22: ru sv'a h'a / ji snyed sbros pa phul nas kyang //
T02D2901:261b-23: de nas mchod bstod yang byas te //
T02D2901:261b-24: gshegs dang bzod pa gsol nas kyang//
T02D2901:261b-25: bsngo dang smon lam gdab par bya //
T02D2901:261b-26: aom a'a: h'um mu: ye shes sems dpa'i gshegs su gsol //
T02D2901:261b-27: dam tshig rang gi snying gar bsdu //
T02D2901:261b-28: mchod dang bsreg pa'i rdzas rnams ni //
T02D2901:261b-29: lhag ma ji snyed yod pa yis //
T02D2901:261b-30: me lha mnyes par yang byas te //
T02D2901:261b-31: mchod pa la sogs gong bzhin no//
T02D2901:261b-32: ye shes me lha gshegs su gsol //
T02D2901:261b-33: dam tshig 'bar ba'i rnam par bstim //
T02D2901:261b-34: bdag gis sbyin sreg sbyar ba yis //
T02D2901:261b-35: dngos grub myur du 'grub gyur cig / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so /
